mapper.select: select p.Property_Name, p.Owner_Email, p.Descr, AVG(r.Score) as rating, p.Capacity, p.Cost, concat(p.Street, ',', p.City, '，', p.State, '，', p.Zip) as address from property as p left join review as r on p.Property_Name = r.Property_Name where p.Capacity >= #{low} and p.Capacity <= #{high} group by p.Property_Name;
select Amenity_Name from Amenity where Property_Name = #{property_name} and Property_Owner = #{property_owner};
select Amenity_Name from Amenity where Property_Name = #{property_name} and Property_Owner = #{property_owner};
